title: Pacific Rim (2013) BDrip {5.1ch aac} [AUDIO ONLY]
description:
#################################################################################
################################ Cry007Baby Presents ##############################

                       PACIFIC RIM 5.1CH AC3 AUDIO STREAM ONLY
      


iNFO: 
   
Format : AAC
Format/Info : Advanced Audio Codec
Format version : Version 4
Format profile : LC
Bit rate mode : Variable
Channel(s) : 6 channels
Channel positions : Front: L C R, Side: L R, LFE
Sampling rate : 48.0 KHz
Compression mode : Lossy
Stream size : 300 MiB (100%)



Note: This is for all those who got tired of complaining to certain well-known uploaders who upload movies only in 2ch mode. For those who have 5.1 ch sound system but don't want to download bigger file,this ought to be just perfect.

How to use: Download MKVmerge or any other muxing software. Drag your existing copy of the movie into MKVmerge,then drag this 5.1ch audio also and start muxing. Voila! You'll have a new file with 2ch + 5.1ch sound!! :)
